name: midpoint
description: Plagued by both indecision as well as the annoyance to travel far to meet up with friends, midpoint was born. Here, we wanted to create a website that found the midpoint between two friends, generating a list of activities/restaurants for a quick catchup.

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm run dev --prefix backend"
